name: alleyoop
description: Approach facing forwards, then spin 180 degrees to grind backwards.

name: truespin alleyoop
description: Approach facing forwards, then spin 180 degrees away from the obstacle and grind backwards.

name: zero spin alleyoop
description: Approach rolling backwards then, without spinning, grind backwards.

name: half cab
description: Approach rolling backwards, then spin 180 degrees towards the obstacle to grind facing forwards.

name: half cab outspin
description: Approach rolling backwards, then spin 180 degrees away from the obstacle to grind facing forwards.

name: hurricane
description: Spin a full 360 degrees away from the obstacle to grind facing forwards.
Spin a full 360 degrees towards the obstacle to grind facing forwards.

name: full cab alleyoop
description: Approach rolling backwards, then spin a full 360 degrees to grind backwards.
